titleStmt.title: The history of the bloody massacres of the Protestants in France in the year of our Lord, 1572 written in Latin by the famous historian, Ja. Aug. Thuanus ; and faithfully rendred into English.
titleStmt.author: Thou, Jacques-Auguste de, 1553-1617.
Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Translated by Edward Stephens [i.e., Socrates Christianus]. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
